resources.nodeOptionText: URL for the Commerce Cloud administration interface, for example, http://localhost:9080
resources.usernameOptionText: The user name for the Commerce Cloud administration interface
resources.passwordOptionText: The password for the Commerce Cloud administration interface
resources.grabOptionText: Copy all available content from the Commerce Cloud instance to the base directory
resources.refreshOptionText: Refresh content from the Commerce Cloud instance in the specified directory
resources.portOptionText: Specify the port that CCProxy will listen to (default 8088)
resources.putAllOptionText: Take all files that are under the specified directory, and any of its sub-directories, and send them back to the Commerce Cloud administration interface
resources.putOptionText: Send a single file back to the Commerce Cloud administration interface
resources.startProxyOptionText: Start a local proxy to substitute Commerce Cloud Resources with local modifications
resources.baseOptionText: Use the supplied directory as the base directory
resources.localeOptionText: Force default locale to the supplied value
resources.allLocalesOptionText: Get text data for all locales rather than just the current locale
resources.cleanOptionText: Used with the --grab option, deletes all local files previously created
resources.noPopupsOptionText: Used with the --put option, suppresses display of popups when an error occurs
resources.applicationKeyOptionText: The application key to use to log in to the Commerce Cloud administration interface
